item.title: Endoscopes
item.description: Backlinks: Leiner Endoscopy and bladder cancery surgery Relate endoscopy to bladder cancery surgery … Procedure: Cystoscopy to inspect the bladder If tumour is found, do resection –> cryosection Cancer detected –> tumour removal Endoscopy Endoscopes (general) Types of endoscopes Endoscope system components Endoscope specification

item.title: Haptic rendering
item.description: Source: SOFA extended documentation The main interest of interactive simulation is that the user can modify the course of the computations in real-time when a virtual medical instrument comes into contact with some models of a soft-tissue, instantaneous deformations must be computed This visual feedback of the contact can be enhanced by haptic rendering so that the surgeon can really feel the contact." Two main issues in SOFA for providing haptics

item.title: Difference between haptic feedback and vibration alerting
